#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int cs,n,i;
int main()
{
  scanf("%d",&cs);
  while(cs--)
  {
    scanf("%d",&n);
    if(n&1)
      printf("0\n");
    else
    {
      printf("9");
      for(i=0;i+1<n/2;i++)
        printf("0");
      printf("\n");
    }
  }
  return 0;
}
